bibl.title: P. Naqlun Inv. 35/88, a Papyrus from the Recently Excavated Monastic Centre in the Fayyum Oasis.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I
bibl.author: DERDA, Tomasz

bibl.note: Polish Archaeological Mission in Deir al-Naqlun, 1988. Gn«siw eﬁd«n, i.e. a list of products written for someone who is titled despÒthw ka‹ patÆr. All the products may have constituted the ingredients of a meal prepared by the monks. Second half of the 6th cent.-first half of the 7th cent. A.D. <gnosis eidon, despotes kai pater>
DERDA Tomasz, P. Naqlun Inv. 35/88, a Papyrus from the Recently Excavated Monastic Centre in the Fayyum Oasis.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I (Cairo, 1992) pp. 603-612, 1 pl.
